Little sister is obviously in on it. How do I know? Cause this same setup has been used a million times. You can see her quivering in the background as she watches what's happening to her sister.. You assume she's mortified. No, she's really stifling laughter. The end of the comic says owari, which implies it's a one shot, but if the author does a sequel, it will definitely have the younger sister as the villain.
